name: Frozen Candy - Ice Cream Heaven
description:
Frozen Candy - Ice Heaven is a brand new match 3 game with chocolate,candies,gummy bear,jewels,diamonds,cakes,sweets,stars,glacier,jelly belly,kitkat,ice cream,Lollipop,Marshmallow,jelly beans and treats.The main objective of the game is to match the little sweets 3 in a row or more either by horrizontal or vertical. If you get 5 in a row, you will get a special color bomb which is very powerful in destroying the sweets and getting tons of bonuses!Make 3 way dash with your fingers and win them all!Enjoy colorful levels and prepare to be amazed of the amazing journey in candyland!Your hear will melt and blossom at the same time.

Do not forget the gems that you can find in the game, they will help you advance further in the game, you can also get more in-apps. Blast these sweets and bonbons out of the game and get the highest score! Your little kids will love the game because it will keep them busy for hours and improve their cognitive functions and their IQ will be off the charts because they really have to calculate their next move in order to get the best result. Enjoy all the cookies and the little sweetnesses of this game.

Frozen Candy - Ice Heaven Features:
• Tasty and sweet candies, jellies, gummy bear your little kids will love playing with the jellies and will blow their minds with awesome game effects!
• Over 100+ breath taking levels
• Lots of game goals, move mode, time mode, collect ingredients mode, etc.
• Surreal graphics, you will want to eat the candies and your heart will blossom when you see the jellies in this game!
• Do your best, get the highest score!
• Match colors in your free time and relax playing a super puzzle game!

Download Frozen Candy - Ice Heaven now and start your amazing bonbon saga experience!
